attributes.action: ensure that the Battle of Britain memorial Flight is not axed in any defence cut .it has been suggested that the Battle Of Memorial Flight(BBMF)-which celebrates the sacrifice of those who flew in World War 2 will be cut in the next round of defence cuts.This will be a travesty if it was to go ahead.The BBMF is said to cost a mere £3m. a yerar less than 0.1% of the Defence budget.It is a great delight for all who see their vdisplays,and if closed the memory of "The Few" will be lost !.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
